reasoning: Binswanger disease (subcortical vascular dementia) prevalence estimated at 1-2% of dementia cases, roughly 15-30 per 100k population with vascular dementia. Reported as prevalence due to chronic neurodegenerative nature. Confidence limited by diagnostic variability and overlap with other vascular dementias.
